title: DNS MX Records
extract: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mx_record - A mail exchanger record (MX record) is a type of resource record in the Domain Name System that specifies a mail server responsible for accepting email messages on behalf of a recipient's domain, and a preference value used to prioritize mail delivery if multiple mail servers ...
